properties.areaDesc: Wabash, IL; Edwards, IL; White, IL; Posey, IN; Knox, IN; Gallatin, IL; Gibson, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued December 31 at 10:12AM EST until January 5 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...A Flood Warning continues for portions of the following waterways
in Indiana...

East Fork White River...Wabash River...White River...

.Precipitation on Sunday and Monday have led to minor flooding conditions
along some points of the East Fork White...White...and Wabash Rivers.
Significant flooding is not expected.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Wabash River at Mount Carmel.
* from Thursday morning to Sunday morning.
* At  8:45 AM Tuesday the stage was 12.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 19.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Thursday morning and continue
to rise to near 19.3 feet by late Thursday night.  It will fall
below flood stage by Saturday evening.
* At 20.0 feet...River is bankfull in all locations.  All oil field
production ceases with the exception of pumping units on
substructures.  Access to these are by boat only.  Agricultural
losses increase dramatically.  Farmers move livestock to higher
ground.  City of Mount Carmel leaves flood gates B and C in year
round.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
